alert.note: Alert for Portage (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:25PM EDT until July 26 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Portage County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ravenna, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ravenna, Edinburg, Windham and Wayland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
